Settings.QueryText: SELECT DocumentJournalRetailSales.Ref, DocumentJournalRetailSales.Date, DocumentJournalRetailSales.DeletionMark, DocumentJournalRetailSales.Number, DocumentJournalRetailSales.Posted, CASE WHEN &WithoutConnectingEquipment THEN SubString(DocumentJournalRetailSales.Number, 6, 6) ELSE DocumentJournalRetailSales.ReceiptNumber END AS ReceiptNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalRetailSales.Type = Type(Document.ReceiptCRReturn) THEN DocumentJournalRetailSales.Amount * -1 ELSE DocumentJournalRetailSales.Amount END AS Amount, DocumentJournalRetailSales.Type FROM DocumentJournal.RetailSales AS DocumentJournalRetailSales WHERE DocumentJournalRetailSales.CashCR = &CashCR AND CASE WHEN (NOT &ChoiceOnStatuses OR DocumentJournalRetailSales.CashCRSession.CashCRSessionStatus = &Status) AND (NOT &FilterByChange OR DocumentJournalRetailSales.CashCRSession = &CashCRSession OR DocumentJournalRetailSales.Ref = &CashCRSession) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AND CASE WHEN DocumentJournalRetailSales.Type = Type(Document.RetailReport) THEN CASE WHEN DocumentJournalRetailSales.CashCRSessionStatus = &Status THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END ELSE TRUE END AND Not DocumentJournalRetailSales.DeletionMark AND DocumentJournalRetailSales.Posted

v8:item.v8:content: Discount is not available for viewing
Products and services characteristic and batch
Total amount of discount is greater than the amount
Cash register Use without connecting equipment

Settings.QueryText: SELECT DocumentReceiptCR.Ref, DocumentReceiptCR.Number, DocumentReceiptCR.Date, DocumentReceiptCR.Archival, DocumentReceiptCR.DocumentCurrency, DocumentReceiptCR.PriceKind, DocumentReceiptCR.CashCR, DocumentReceiptCR.CashCRSession, DocumentReceiptCR.Comment, DocumentReceiptCR.IncludeVATInPrice, DocumentReceiptCR.ReceiptCRNumber, DocumentReceiptCR.Company, DocumentReceiptCR.CashReceived, DocumentReceiptCR.StructuralUnit, DocumentReceiptCR.Status, DocumentReceiptCR.DocumentAmount, DocumentReceiptCR.PaymentForm, DocumentReceiptCR.VATTaxation, DocumentReceiptCR.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentReceiptCR.POSTerminal, DocumentReceiptCR.DiscountMarkupKind, DocumentReceiptCR.Department, DocumentReceiptCR.Author, DocumentReceiptCR.Responsible, DocumentReceiptCR.DiscountCard, DocumentReceiptCR.DiscountPercentByDiscountCard, DocumentReceiptCR.DiscountsAreCalculated, DocumentReceiptCR.PointInTime, CASE WHEN &WithoutConnectingEquipment THEN SubString(DocumentReceiptCR.Number, 6, 6) ELSE DocumentReceiptCR.ReceiptCRNumber END AS ReceiptNumber FROM Document.ReceiptCR AS DocumentReceiptCR WHERE DocumentReceiptCR.CashCR = &CashCR AND CASE WHEN (NOT &ChoiceOnStatuses OR DocumentReceiptCR.CashCRSession.CashCRSessionStatus = &Status) AND (NOT &FilterByChange OR DocumentReceiptCR.CashCRSession = &CashCRSession) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AND DocumentReceiptCR.Posted

SELECT DocumentReceiptCRReturn.Ref, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.Number, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.Date, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.Archival, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.DocumentCurrency, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.PriceKind, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.CashCR, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.CashCRSession, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.Comment, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.ReceiptCRNumber, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.Company, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.StructuralUnit, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.DocumentAmount, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.VATTaxation, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.ReceiptCR, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.POSTerminal, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.IncludeVATInPrice, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.DiscountMarkupKind, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.Department, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.Author, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.Responsible, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.DiscountCard, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.DiscountPercentByDiscountCard, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.DiscountsAreCalculated, DocumentReceiptCRReturn.PointInTime, CASE WHEN &WithoutConnectingEquipment THEN SubString(DocumentReceiptCRReturn.Number, 6, 6) ELSE DocumentReceiptCRReturn.ReceiptCRNumber END AS ReceiptNumber FROM Document.ReceiptCRReturn AS DocumentReceiptCRReturn WHERE DocumentReceiptCRReturn.CashCR = &CashCR AND CASE WHEN (NOT &ChoiceOnStatuses OR DocumentReceiptCRReturn.CashCRSession.CashCRSessionStatus = &Status) AND (NOT &FilterByChange OR DocumentReceiptCRReturn.CashCRSession = &CashCRSession) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END
